Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Imposes a pass-through entity tax
Summary: Establishes provisions related to imposing a pass-through entity tax.
LawCode: Add Art 24-A §§860 - 867, amd §§606, 620 & 171-a, Tax L; amd §§92-z & 68-c, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to the imposition of a pass-through entity tax
